item.title: Female Instagram & TikTok Creator for Faceless Content - Upwork
item.description:
*Do not apply if your want to offer your rate card, this a fixed contract only open to reasonable negations*
Lets not waste each others time please. This be a recurring job every month and we will continue improve the offer with every passing month. Looking forward to meeting you.

We are looking for a talented female Instagram and TikTok creator to produce faceless content for various brands including jewelry, phone cases, plush toys, etc. The content will consist of 100 & Product photos with videos ranging from 5 to 15 seconds each. As a creator, you will be responsible for capturing the attention of our target audience through captivating and creative videos that showcase the products in an engaging way But we will also provide a lot of guidance for the job to make it as smooth as possible.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in video creation and editing
    - Strong understanding of Instagram and TikTok trends and features
    - Ability to create visually appealing and attention-grabbing content
    - Familiarity with popular jewelry, phone case, and plush toy brands
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

    This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1. We are looking for an intermediate-level creator who can bring fresh ideas and creativity to our brand. If you are passionate about creating viral content and have a knack for showcasing products in a unique way, we would love to hear from you!

*Please do keep in mind this is not the rate per video but the entire Job*

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 27, 2024 09:04 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Management, Content Creation
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Management, Content Creation
Country: NLD
click to apply

item.title: Improve the authenticity of AI generated human figure videos - Upwork
item.description:
I would like to know to what extent you can make modifications and enhance the authenticity of AI-generated images/videos.  There are distortions to their hands and tattoos. There are also distortions to logos and patterns on the clothing. The proportion of some body parts such as forearms is also not ideal.

What I’m looking for: someone who can edit the generated result in accordance with the reference image so that the logos, body movements, and facial expressions are as close as possible to 100% authenticity as if the video was taken in real life.

In the attachment, you find the generated result, the reference image, and the ‘expected’ result. The expected results were given by CGI colleagues but I believe we can get closer to authenticity. I’m also seeking someone who knows what authenticity means so we don’t need endless revisions. Everything should be as close as possible to the provided reference images (all details on the shirt, face,  hands, etc.)

To clarify, we are looking for a long-term relationship were you would be able to transform the generated AI result into a commercially usable product on a large scale.

Please be honest and let me know if human animations/images are possible since this requires a specific skill set and what pricing can be expected. This is a huge opportunity.

Additionally we would also need you to add some extra effects to the human animation (add backgrounds, add products, add visual effects, paste human animation in a different video background etc. )

PLEASE REACH OUT SO I CAN GIVE YOU MORE EXAMPLES

Kind regards


Tasks for you are: 1. Fixing the hand distortions 2. Fixing the tattoo distortions 3. Fixing distortions to logos and patterns on the clothing 4. Adjusting any disproportional body parts 5. Improving the general authenticity of the human figure and movement in the video 6. (Optional) Crop out the human figure and paste it onto an image or video background.

Example videos generated from our AI model are attached.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 09:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, AI-Generated Video, Video Commercial, Motion Retouching, Visual Effects, CGI, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, AI-Generated Video, Video Commercial, Motion Retouching, Visual Effects, CGI, Motion Graphics
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Freelancer Video Editor for Promotional basis - Upwork
item.description:
Make a social impact with the videos you make. Help the Persons with Disabilities by creating accessible videos. Live a corporate creative life while being the CHANGE you ever wanted.

Job Responsibilities Include:(Freelancer)
Edits videos to targeted length and specifications
Handles and organizes raw and edited video files
Exports videos and facilitates mobile and web distribution
Shoots video and produces content as necessary
Explores different versions and directions
Ensures compliance with highest journalist standards
Adjusts formats and file sizes as needed

Job Requirements:
Minimum 1 year of video editing and post-production experience
Proficient in various non-linear video editing tools and other software (Edius, Adobe Premiere pro, Photoshop, Lightroom, Adobe Illustrator, Motion Graphics)
Deep understanding of digital trends and editing principles
Creative and innovative
Strong organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills
Bachelor’s degree in film or related field

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 27, 2024 08:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor for Promotional Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a short promotional video for an upcoming mall in Seychelles. The video will be approximately 120 seconds long and a detailed script will be provided. As a video editor, you will be responsible for assembling the raw footage, adding special effects, sound, and graphics to create a compelling video that showcases the features and attractions of the mall. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software, attention to detail, and a creative eye.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Motion graphics
    - Sound design
    - Attention to detail
    - Creativity

We run a digital marketing agency and are looking for a long term video editor, this is a demo video for one of my clients, if we like it we shall hire you on contract basis permanently.
You can ask me to provide the detailed video script. Thanks



Budget: $20
Posted On: June 27, 2024 08:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Uganda
click to apply

item.title: Ongoing Personal Social Media Posting & Marketing: 2 Accounts - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone to manage two Instagram accounts.  One has an audience of about 22k and the other about 58k

We are looking for very basic social media management.

Each account needs roughly 6 images and 1-2 reels posted every month.

We will provide pre-selected images that need basic editing, spot removal, filter etc applied to them. You're welcome to use FaceApp, but keep it will need to be subtle.

Reels content requires basic editing of pre-selected videos into reels with appropriate music selection and well timed edits.

In terms of growth / engagement it is not vital. Both accounts just need to be maintained rather than grown.

We don't anticipate that the work should take any more than 6-10 hours a month. Both accounts can share a lot of the same content. However posted in a different order. Details to be discussed.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$9.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 08:42 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Instagram, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Instagram, Adobe Photoshop
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Video Reviewer - Test and Evaluate Online Websites in Make Money Category - Upwork
item.description:
Do you have a keen eye for detail and love uncovering the truth? Are you comfortable on camera? We're looking for a video reviewer in the US to join our team and create informative reviews of online and offline earning platforms.

In this role, you'll:

- Sign up for popular platforms like Swagbucks, User Interviews, Instacart and more to test your detective skills.
- Earn real money by completing surveys, following instructions on microtask platforms, and trying out gig economy jobs (keep these earnings – they're yours!)
- Test the app for around 5 hours
- Document your experience: record yourself cashing out and completing tasks.
- Become a star! Create engaging video reviews which will be edited by professional video editor (no prior video experience needed, we'll provide training!)

Why You'll Love Working Here:

- Flexible hours: work whenever you want, wherever you want as long as it's in USA.
- Competitive pay: earn $75 per video review (expenses covered if any), plus keep your earnings from the app that you have tested (up to $15 extra per hour!)
- Be a part of something bigger: your reviews help others make informed decisions online.
- Focus on your performance, not editing: Don't worry about perfecting your video editing skills - our team will handle the post-production magic!

Ready to join the team?

If you're a detail-oriented individual with a passion for sharing your discoveries, we want to hear from you! Apply today!

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 27, 2024 08:40 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Skills: Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Tik tok content creator based in Germany - Upwork
item.description:
Tik Tok content creator based in GERMANY for a grily book

Hello everyone, I'm actually looking for someone who's able to make TikTok  three times a day for an adult coloring book, this book is principally contending drawing.

You don't need to be an expert into coloring or drawing, you just need to ba able to caption all the trends, create emotional videos and adapt it to promote the book. We have an account where you can find inspiration

The salary of it would be 200$ a month for posting three times a day so approximately 30min/1h of work a day, everyday. If you have some questions please feel free to send me a message. If you can add in your message your own TikTok account to see what kind of video you are used to make its a + Thanks a lot.

BONUS :
- For each videos who has more than 100K views  we add additionnal bonus of 25 dollars
- For each videos who has more than 1M views  we add additionnal bonus of 200 dollars !

Can't wait to work with you !


Posted On: June 27, 2024 08:34 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing Strategy, Content Creation, Video Production, Video Editing & Production, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Marketing
Skills: Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing Strategy, Content Creation, Video Production, Video Editing & Production, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Marketing
Country: France

item.title: Channel Manager for YouTube Channel with +5M subscribers network - Upwork
item.description:
The company  is seeking for individuals with experience and passion for video production to run our Celebrity related YouTube channels, with a focus on celebrity gossips. It's important that you as a channel manager have an interest in these topics.

What are you going to do:
This person will be in charge of making sure the channel operations run smoothly and managing our team of freelance video producers from all over the world.

The Channel Manager will manage & recruit the hosts, writers, voice actors, and video editors that contribute content. You will guide and feed them topics for the videos that need to be produced and will take care of the quality control of the videos during the post-production process. In addition, the Channel Manager will take care of the scheduling strategy, asset management, uploads, and video thumbnail generation.

Tasks:

-Development of YouTube videos
-Channel scheduling strategy based on channel’s analytics
-Video uploads and optimization
-Day-to-day channel audience engagement
-Video Quality Control
-Manage & recruit new freelancers for the channel

Qualifications:
-Great knowledge of video production and post-production
-Team Management Experience
-Solid understanding of the YouTube Platform
-Good video editing skills
-Editorial, Social Media and Marketing Experience
-Good leadership skills
-Excellent communication skills
-Photoshop experience an asset
-Excellent analytical abilities and leadership qualities.
-Highly process-oriented and entrepreneurial spirited.
-Highly motivated, organized and detail-orientated
-Data-driven individual who can use data to make creative decisions


*Only apply if you are in UK Time zone
*Can earn up to 3000$ (will be handling diff. channels)


Budget: $3,000
Posted On: June 27, 2024 08:28 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:YouTube Development, Marketing Strategy
Skills: YouTube Development, Marketing Strategy
Country: Sweden
click to apply
